Summary: slow moving ball moving across the sky
divs: sighting detailsslow moving ball moving across the sky west to south. starting from left side of venus from belleville, mi pov. made no sound, it was steady. appeared orange\yellow near venus, then looked white when it was over us.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Belleville
